column5: Hey guys, wife took my Dodge Ram MegaCab through a tight Bank machine drive thru today and well let's just say it was tight! Scratched the drivers side Good, luckily when the truck made contact with the post she didn't freak out and accelerate. Ironically I was out pricing and test driving Ram Power Wagons LOL. So does anyone have any tips or experiances with scratch removal products ? Thanks for any tips. R
What did you use for the dog scratch bud?   I used a few products. Nu look worked best for me.CTC has it.
Clear coat? Color? Is it through the primer? Down to the metal? Mguiers makes scratch remover and it works well for solid color on light scratches.
Little bit of everything, clear coat down to the primer. Dealership wanted 1000$ . Just hoping to get it presentable for a trade in. Thx, R
Just slap an OFC bumper sticker over the ouchie!!!!
Hahahaha, damn labs Lol! Have to hook up for some fly fishing soon.
